body:
Comment 6 by **mt4swm**: 
I think i actually can live fine with the situation as it is, and
try to structure things in the suggested way.
Btw, cmd/go is an impressive tool already which makes building things
much easier compared to maintaining per-directory Makefiles.
It's just good to know, before starting to re-structure existing projects,
what the options are -- it might have been the case, that one or the
other feature/pattern I had been looking for was around the corner
and would have made the re-structuring unnecessary.
So, as for me this issue might be closed.
